task.summary: Default task
:clap: :boom: initial release 0.0.1
set chmod to +x
ignore src dir in npm package
add disclaimer to readme, do not ignore build in npm package
set main script to built index
allow to specify function to processCss, preprocessCss, append, prepend, generateScopedName, closes #2
fix copyright year
accumulate generated css styles for imported/required css files

parse configuration and require css-modules-require-hook only once through lifetime of a plugin (perf optimization + bug fix when multiple imports/requires are in one file with advanced options), closes #7
fix build (remove absolute path from local filesystem omg)
fix bug in plugin require
try to reproduce the problem from #13
add docker environment for error case
update readme for babel-register hook
update readme for mocha
update nodejs on circleci
upgrade css-modules-require-hook, closes #14
bump version of css-modules-require-hook, closes #18
add utility functions
add options resolvers, fixes #10
refactor plugin main file, extract options resolvers and utils to standalone libs
update README to reflect all possible options
simulate babel-register too
add disclaimer to include node_modules to babel ignore option
:art: extract extractCssFile and writeCssFile to standalone functions and add checks for path variables
:bug: fix path variable in extractCss.filename option, update README, closes #25
